name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language. It is widely used for front-end web development and has gained popularity in recent years for back-end development as well. JavaScript allows developers to add interactivity and dynamic functionality to web pages. It is supported by all modern web browsers, making it a versatile choice for web development.JavaScript is known for its ease of use and flexibility. It has a large and active community, providing abundant resources and libraries for developers. JavaScript's loose typing allows for more flexibility in coding but can also lead to potential pitfalls. Overall, JavaScript is a fundamental language in web development, offering powerful capabilities and a vast ecosystem of frameworks and tools.
